data.text: @Dr_Ellie @nadhimzahawi @UKHSA_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland All lies

@Dr_Ellie @nadhimzahawi @UKHSA_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland Tutti i miei amici stanno morendo improvvisamente c è qualcosa che non va nei vaccini visto che io ho pure dovuto smettere di frequentare vaccinati perché poi sto male come se mi passassero  qualcosa purtroppo anche i miei cari
@Dr_Ellie @nadhimzahawi @UKHSA_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland The importance to die
@Dr_Ellie @PHE_uk @nadhimzahawi @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland @RelationShopper

@DGBAMCH57 @Dr_Ellie @PHE_uk @nadhimzahawi @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @stuartjdneil @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland What do you mean? The statement was that it reduces transmission by up to a half. There is no other half. If transmission was 50 people then reducing transmission by half means 25 people. What on earth are you asking?

@Dr_Ellie @PHE_uk @nadhimzahawi @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland It's a shame the study was so flawed.  Obviously people who are sick are about 10 times more likely to stay at home.  The vaccine prevents symptoms, seems like that was forgotten.

@comedyrapapack @Dr_Ellie @PHE_uk @nadhimzahawi @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @stuartjdneil @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland Which means less posibilities of getting infected retard.

@ShantzShantz @AEHALL1983 @Dr_Ellie @nadhimzahawi @PHE_uk @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @stuartjdneil @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland I was never in doubt. The most frustrating thing about it all is that the majority of the population dont see it

@CryptopianGuy @AEHALL1983 @Dr_Ellie @nadhimzahawi @PHE_uk @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @stuartjdneil @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland Sadly so.

Wish I was wrong

2) How would you defend your own actions?

@Dr_Ellie @PHE_uk @nadhimzahawi @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @stuartjdneil @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland Well there's a surprise. The jab minimises symptoms.. If you don't have symptoms you're highly unlikely to pass the virus on, that's been the same since day one. "Assymptomatic spread" has always been a massive red herring hugely overplayed.

@Dr_Ellie @PHE_uk @nadhimzahawi @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @stuartjdneil @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland It’s a shame it’s taken so long to get this type of good vaccine news out. Obvious from the start that they reduce transmission. UK GOV need to get positive now

@Dr_Ellie @PHE_uk @nadhimzahawi @PHE_London @MattHancock @BBCBreakfast @DrNeilStone @stuartjdneil @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSuk @CFO_NHS @NHSEngland So this is where only indoor get togethers will be allowed for those who have had the vax? 🤔can see where this is going.......
